tool_description: Text to speech API is a cloud based service that enables developers to generate human-like speech output from text input.
title: Text to speech Api

api_list.name: Text-to-Speech Api
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://text-to-speech-api5.p.rapidapi.com/tts"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-to-speech-api5.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
